relation.text: tell you that Edinburgh has been our place of residence since last March
some use to Cathcart , as a Check to that absurd Manner , he has within these few Years
gave her & which the Child had for three Months
Quarters in future . My Regt- is gone
a couple of Years . I bought
three Months . This is a little in the Visitation style , but as he seems
make a convenience of his invitation . My sister Sir T. Clavering now
